job_details.Functieomschrijving: The majority of the resources would be supporting the development of assets (e.g., plugins) to further drive our overall AI strategy across the firm. In addition to that, we have ongoing AI R&D initiatives that we'd look to leverage some of these roles to help us continue driving the initiatives
job_details.full_text:
Senior / Lead AI Engineer

The majority of the resources would be supporting the development of assets (e.g., plugins) to further drive our overall AI strategy across the firm. In addition to that, we have ongoing AI R&D initiatives that we'd look to leverage some of these roles to help us continue driving the initiatives

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is very high-level and lacks specific technical details about the tasks, models, or technologies involved. It mentions 'AI strategy' and 'AI R&D' but does not provide enough information to classify it as a specific AI engineering role like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: supporting the development of assets (e.g., plugins) to further drive our overall AI strategy across the firm
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a need to understand and contribute to the firm's broader AI strategy, aligning technical development with business goals.
This suggests involvement in research and development, which often requires understanding business needs and future directions.

soft_skills.phrase: further drive our overall AI strategy
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'drive our overall AI strategy' implies a proactive and leading role in advancing the company's AI initiatives.
This reinforces the idea of taking ownership and proactively pushing forward AI R&D efforts.
Research and Development inherently requires continuous learning and adaptation to new findings and technologies.
